text: what do you mean by "bulk disable"?

<@U01ASFZL4UA> - Disable = turn them off. We’re doing a data sync that will trigger a half-dozen workflows, which will cascade to 2-3 dozen others, and send notifications to customers. The important part is: I don’t want to send notifications while we’re doing the sync. Any ideas?

Open a new field at the contact level, you can use true / false contact property. Set this field to True when the contact enters the workflow where the data is synchronized. Once all the actions you want are completed, clear that filed that you set. In a workflow where you want a particular contact to enroll only after it has all the necessary data - put as a trigger that this field is False (along with other triggers). .> But this can be tricky. That's one way. The second way is: Set the workflow that sends notifications to the manual enroll, and add it at the end of the workflow that syncs the data - that at that point the contact enroll in that other workflow. (But only if you use two contact based wf)
If you need help, DM me with screenshots.
